group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:3035A02]Take that!

group_1.narration: "Sour plums, pickled daikon, rolled eggs,@salmon, omelets, and hamburg steak♪"

group_1.textRight: That weird song! So it was you all along!
That was a really mean song!
Saying I'm clumsy and only have bad-tasting@memories!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:3035A02]Rrraaaaaaaaah!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][chara:303500:effect_shake]Aaahhh!
Of course you'd think that all my memories@taste bad!
There's no way you'd enjoy them!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:3035A06]Take that!!
All of the food here isn't just some plain@old bento food!

group_1.narration: They're all precious happy memories of mine@that have taken the form of yummy food@placed neatly in a delicious bento box!
If a Witch spewing unhappiness@and curses ate the food with my@happy memories, of course@it'd taste super bad to them!

group_1.textRight: It's because you took a bite out of my@memories that all the food rotted...
Leaving only sad memories to come to mind!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall]縺薙?縺雁ｭ舌■繧?∪縺鯉ｼ@縺?＞蜉?貂帶ｭｻ縺ｫ縺ｪ縺｣

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2]My memories aren't for you to eat!
They're for me to remember...
They're for me to taste and remind myself of @happy times when I'm feeling lonely or sad.
I'll never forgive you for eating them like @that!

group_1.textCenter: It's about time you end this!

group_1.textRight: Yeah!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:3035A02]Taaaaaake that!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:3035A02]And that and that!
Maybe you wanted to know what happy memories taste like.
But there's not a single memory here that's@okay for you to eat!
Plus... You don't need a bento!
I'll give you...
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:3035A07]A super-large yakisoba bun! Eat THIS!!!
